resources.string: Please select your Units of measurement. Then Enter a Weight in Pounds or Kilograms
Begin BASIC life support : A B C
A = Airway - Assess for airway obstruction, assess for breathing, perform intubation ▶
B = Breathing - Ventilate with 100% oxygen, 10-24 breaths/minute ▶
B = Breathing - Ventilate with 100% oxygen, 10-24 breaths/minute ▶
C = Circulation - Assess for heart beat and pulses if absent, begin chest compressions, 100-120 compressions/minute ▶
C = Circulation - Assess for heart beat and pulses if absent, begin chest compressions, 100-120 compressions/minute ▶
Obtain Electrocardiogram and Determine Arrest Rhythm
IV catheter for Drug Therapy and Fluid administration
1/4 to 1/3 shock dose over 20-30 mins, reassess and repeat prn
